reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and perfect for birthday occasions, with high-quality sequins and a flattering design that hugs curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful. Looks like an expensive dress!
items.body: This dress is actually perfect. I didn't expect it to look as good as it does in the photos, but it really does! The epaulettes really make this look like a well-made dress, add visual interest, and allow a basically sleeveless look with a bit of upper arm coverage. I'm 5'7, weigh 180. Based on reviews, I wanted to get an XL, which I think would have worked. I got an XXL because it shipped much sooner. There was a little space in it, and I will need safety pins for the straps as they wanted to fall down. But overall, I'm delighted. It looks like an expensive dress and was perfect for my starfish-themed outfit. Read more
items.author: Kim B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Fit really well, top area was a little big but not an issue. Beautiful colors and received compliments all night. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
items.body: My first impression when I took it out of the package was that it had some weight to it which tells me it is decent quality. It fits nicely for the most part. I wish they had a size xs. I am 5'5" with a 34A bust, a size small for shirts and a size 2/3 for pants. I will need to wear heels with it but they won't need to be crazy tall. The top part has built-in cups so if you are large enough to fill them (I am not) then you wouldn't need a bra. I will wear one just for comfort but I could get away with not wearing one. I love the beads that hang on the arm. They make the dress feel super fancy. The mid section isn't as fitted as I would have hoped but again I should be an xs if they carried that size. I plan on pinning it. My event will be at night and nobody will even notice. I may have it altered if possible after. I plan on posting photos after the event and adjusting my review if necessary. As of right now I would recommend it to anyone size 4 and up and maybe no shorter than 5'4" unless you love super high heels. Overall it is a gorgeous dress for any nice occassion and very reasonable price. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have
items.body: Buy it! Stretchy+ built in bra+extremely forgiving, comfortable and beautiful!!! I expect this to last multiple wears. For reference I’m 5’1 and size 12 Read more
items.author: Anderson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress but not flattering. Size medium fit fine but just didn’t do much for me.
items.body: The built in bra made no sense to me. They were in the wrong place & created an awkward look. Could have been great but just wasn’t for me anyway. I am 5’5” 145 pounds & very curvy. Beautiful dress & great quality & color as expected Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marilyn Monroe- Happy Birthday dress
items.body: Worked great for my Marilyn Monroe “Happy Birthday Mr President” costume. Length was perfect and comfortable. I did remove the beading from the shoulders as it was a bit rough and quite heavy. I could have ordered a smaller size to make more form fitting but knew I’d be wearing this for several hours and wanted to be comfortable. Very pleased with the purchase Read more
items.author: V. M. Butler

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy
items.body: Couldn't return this. The material was not see-through, functionality wasn't the greatest around the arms, not warm whatsoever, the style was so pretty I wish it was easier to wear. I'm 5"3' 170lbs ordered a large and it was wonderful. But again due to the sleeves and the beading placement, horrid. Read more
items.author: Maris Swid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful form fitting dress
items.body: I loved everything about this dress! Form fitting, nice material, endless compliments!! Size up, I’m 5”5 170lbs DD breast size and had to size up to an XL then it was perfect Read more
items.author: Daniellle

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Maxi Mermaid V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Maxi Mermaid V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-blue&red, A-black, A-silver, B-blue&silver, A-green, A-wine, Colorful Wine, A-beige, B-black&red, Colorful White, Colorful Green, Colorful Black, A-blue, B-blue&green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
